### writeNopData() {#a88b2f08af754834c45de4e5017a11a19}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool MipsAsmBackend::writeNopData (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, uint64&#95;t Count, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
WriteNopData - Write an (optimal) nop sequence of Count bytes to the given output.

If the target cannot generate such a sequence, it should return an error.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
- True on success.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipsasmbackend-h/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipsasmbackend-h">MipsAsmBackend.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipsasmbackend-cpp/#l00529">529</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipsasmbackend-cpp">MipsAsmBackend.cpp</a>.
